sqlMap.sql: select a.userCode,a.uintCode,b.projectID, b.name as projectName,b.projectType,b.totalPoeples from projectInfo b join projectOwner a on a.projectID=b.projectID [companyType | join CompanyInfo c on b.companyId=c.companyId] where 1=1 {projectOwner:a,projectInfo:b} [projectType:pt| and b.projectType=:pt] [:companyType,:companyName | and c.companyType=:companyType and c.companyName like :companyName] order by b.name

select USERCODE as userCode, USERPIN as userPin , ISVALID as isValid, USERTYPE as userType, LOGINNAME as loginName, USERNAMEas userName, ENGLISHNAME as englishName, USERDESC as userDesc, LOGINTIMES as loginTimes, ACTIVETIME as activeTime, PWDEXPIREDTIME as pwdExpiredTime, LOGINIP as loginIp, ADDRBOOKID as addrbookId, REGEMAIL as regEmail , REGCELLPHONE as regCellPhone, USERWORD as userWord, USERTAG as userTag, USERORDER as userOrder, PRIMARYUNIT as primaryUnit from F_USERINFO
update F_USERINFO set USERPIN = ? where USERCODE = ?
select USER_CODE, USER_NAME , PRIMARY_UNIT, USER_ORDER from F_USERINFO where ISVALID='T' order by USER_ORDER
select UNIT_CODE, PARENT_UNIT, UNIT_NAME, UNIT_MANAGER, UNIT_ORDER, UNIT_PATH from F_UNITINFO where ISVALID='T' order by UNIT_ORDER
select UNIT_CODE, USER_CODE, USER_STATION, USER_RANK, IS_PRIMARY as isPrimary, USER_ORDER as userOrder from F_USERUNIT
select USER_CODE, ROLE_CODE, 'D' as OBTAIN_TYPE, '' as inherited_From from F_USERROLE
select DATA_CODE as RANK_CODE, DATA_VALUE as RANK_NAME, EXTRA_CODE as RANK from F_DATADICTIONARY where CATALOG_CODE = 'RankType'
select DATA_CODE as STATION_CODE, DATA_VALUE as STATION_NAME from F_DATADICTIONARY where CATALOG_CODE = 'StationType'
select DATA_CODE as RANK_CODE, EXTRA_CODE as RANK from F_DATADICTIONARY where CATALOG_CODE = 'FlowUserRole'
select ROLE_CODE, ROLE_NAME from F_ROLEINFO where IS_VALID = 'T'
